full_threads.body: +15mins to Harvest

Hi Karen,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to provide you with an update on the recent changes we implemented.

All modifications have been made exclusively to the "draft" page, ensuring no impact on the live page.

You can review the changes through the following links:
Live Page: https://privatuscp.com/investments/
Draft Page: https://privatuscp.com/investment-draft/

Notably, there are no duplicates within the investments carousel on the draft page, as it is configured to rotate infinitely. We have successfully completed the remaining tasks as well.

If you have any further inquiries or require additional assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Hi @rica

  • I have just noticed that the changes are actually live on the website and the investments page is incorrect. (the changes in investment draft page is not live, here's the draft link https://privatuscp.com/investment-draft/)
  • on the Investments page, for the Privatus Capital Fund there are 5 investments that either need to rotate (like the team pictures do) or be set up in two rows with three investments at the top (Automic, Viridios and Story House) and 2 at the bottom (FairSupply and Carbon Friendly). The list of Privatus Capital Fund Investments is already rotating (screenshot), @rica please double-check if its working to your end

link:https://privatuscp.com/investment-draft/
Screenshot


  • At the moment there are duplicates of Viridios and Fair Supply on that page, the order is incorrect and the second row does not format correctly on a mobile.  (we don't have duplicates of viridios and fair supply, the list is set to "Infinite" to rotate back to the first slide
  • Also if possible, on the team pages, can you move Zara's image down slightly to line up her chin with Abbeys' (this is only if easy to do, otherwise ok to leave as is). Done

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi

I have just noticed that the changes are actually live on the website and the investments page is incorrect. As per previous emails, on the Investments page, for the Privatus Capital Fund there are 5 investments that either need to rotate (like the team pictures do) or be set up in two rows with three investments at the top (Automic, Viridios and Story House) and 2 at the bottom (FairSupply and Carbon Friendly). At the moment there are duplicates of Viridios and Fair Supply on that page, the order is incorrect and the second row does not format correctly on a mobile. Can you please correct as soon as possible given the site is live. Also if possible, on the team pages, can you move Zara's image down slightly to line up her chin with Abbeys' (this is only if easy to do, otherwise ok to leave as is).

Best regards

Karen

Karen Bell Chief Operating Officer

+15mins to harvest

Hello Karen,

My sincere apologies for the delay. We have implemented the changes as per your instructions. You can review the updated content by following this link: Investment Draft.

Should you have any additional requests or if further adjustments are needed, please don't hesitate to inform us.

Hi @rica following updates are done

  • 1. ✅ Zara - now her head is a bit too big - is it possible to match her face size to Abbey's - if not them leave as is
  • 2. ✅ On Story House I am not sure what is happening on the investments page as there should only be 5 investments shown in 5 boxes and now Viridios and Fair Supply are showing up twice (once on the top row and again on the second). To simplify it (as carousel seems not possible) can we just have 5 boxes - 3 at the top (Automic, Viridios and Story House) and 2 at the bottom (Fair Supply and Carbon Friendly).
  • 3. ✅ Also for Story House there should be 2 paragraphs inside the box - the one starting "Story House is one of the largest" and one starting "Privatus invested" (so same para format as others).
  • 4. ✅ Finally I noticed that in the Investments tab we also need to add StoryHouse to the intro so it should say 'To date our Privatus Capital Fund Investments have included Automic, Viridios, Story House, FairSupply and Carbon Friendly'.

@rica For Task Number 2, the carousel was previously set to infinite scrolling, causing it to loop back to the first slide. I have disabled this feature to display only five boxes in the carousel now.

Draft: https://privatuscp.com/investment-draft/

Time: +10mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Thanks for making the changes. I have reviewed them and have a couple of further adjustments:
  • Zara - now her head is a bit too big - is it possible to match her face size to Abbey's - if not them leave as is
  • On Story House I am not sure what is happening on the investments page as there should only be 5 investments shown in 5 boxes and now Viridios and Fair Supply are showing up twice (once on the top row and again on the second). To simplify it (as carousel seems not possible) can we just have 5 boxes - 3 at the top (Automic, Viridios and Story House) and 2 at the bottom (Fair Supply and Carbon Friendly). Also for Story House there should be 2 paragraphs inside the box - the one starting "Story House is one of the largest" and one starting "Privatus invested" (so same para format as others).
  • Finally I noticed that in the Investments tab we also need to add StoryHouse to the intro so it should say 'To date our Privatus Capital Fund Investments have included Automic, Viridios, Story House, FairSupply and Carbon Friendly'.
Thanks for your help. Best regards Karen Karen Bell Chief Operating Officer M +61 419 437 325 T +61 2 8313 7092 E karen@privatuscp.com Level 11, Kyle House, 27 Macquarie Place, Sydney NSW 2000

Hi @rica following updates are completed

  • ✅ Zara - Can we make Zara's face slightly larger so it is similar to Abbey's which is right next to her (keep the top of the head where it is). If that's a lot of work, then don't worry.
  • ✅ Story House - the Story House image should be changed to the one below (happy for you to crop it as needed to fit) 
  • ✅ and when putting Story house on the image can you make it white like for the other investments as the colour stands out and looks odd. 
  • ✅ We also shouldn't have a second row of investments , the idea is for them to scroll around in a loop (like we do for other logos) 
  • ✅ and please insert Story House after Viridios per previous email.
  • ✅ I also noticed you added text for Story House but you should use the one I sent which is replicated below (format should be the same as others ie two paras. 
  • ✅ Finally Story House is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia (not Greenslopes, Qld Australia) so please replace under investments on the landing page.
  • ✅ Address - we have also realised we need to change our address in the footer (and anywhere else it appears) as we have moved to:
Investment draft: https://privatuscp.com/investment-draft/

Time: +20mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi

I can see the changes have already been added to the website (not sure if this was intentional or accidental given your email for me to approve).

A couple of last edits below;.


  1. Zara - Can we make Zara's face slightly larger so it is similar to Abbey's which is right next to her (keep the top of the head where it is). If that's a lot of work, then don't worry.




  1. Story House - the Story House image should be changed to the one below (happy for you to crop it as needed to fit) and when putting Story house on the image can you make it white like for the other investments as the colour stands out and looks odd. We also shouldn't have a second row of investments , the idea is for them to scroll around in a loop (like we do for other logos) and please insert Story House after Viridios per previous email. I also noticed you added text for Story House but you should use the one I sent which is replicated below (format should be the same as others ie two paras. Finally Story House is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia (not Greenslopes, Qld Australia) so please replace under investments on the landing page.





Story House is one of the largest childcare and early education platforms in Australia with a portfolio of strategically positioned centres located in metro and regional growth corridors. Privatus invested in Story House alongside Roc Partners.


  1. Address - we have also realised we need to change our address in the footer (and anywhere else it appears) as we have moved to:
